Job Description:
Web Application Engineer

BS Computer Science or related field with 4- 6 years of strong web or software application development experience. Ability to create,  manage and deploy web services. The ideal candidate will be able to understand the product requirements and translate them into high- level design specifications. Must also be a good communicator,  creative,  exceptionally hard working,  possess strong analytical skills and have the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
